thread.title: Is this the craziest dismissal ever? - Yahoo7
thread.title_full: Is this the craziest dismissal ever? - Yahoo7

author: Joey Riordan
title: Is this the craziest dismissal ever? - Yahoo7
text:
Share Is this the craziest dismissal ever? - Yahoo7 Kiwi batter Katey Martin has been dismissed in the most unusual circumstances during New Zealand's third T20 against Australia at the Adelaide Oval. Close Martin out in crazy dismissal UP NEXT VIDEO Martin out in crazy dismissal. Vid: Channel 9 Martin out in crazy dismissal 
Martin advanced down the crease to face a delivery from Australia's Amanda-Jade Wellington, and managed to block the ball. 
However unluckily for Martin, she connected with the bouncing ball again as she swung her bat back down, hitting it back into her own stumps. 
To the delight of the Aussie fielders the bails were dislodged and Martin was out bowled for just one run. The bails are dislodged. Pic: Ch9 
Check out the unusual wicket in the video at the top of the page. 
The crazy dismissal is reminiscent of this hugely unlucky dismissal of Andre Russell. Close Brutal bouncer knocks Russell onto his own stumps UP NEXT VIDEO Andre Russell was dismissed in scenes reminiscent of stick cricket in Sydney Thunder's loss to Melbourne Renegades. Brutal bouncer knocks Russell onto his own stumps 
And this fairly stupid run out of Blackcap bowler Neil Wagner, whose whole body was past the crease. Close Unluckiest run out of all time? Wagner caught despite whole body being behind crease UP NEXT VIDEO Unluckiest run out of all time? Wagner caught despite whole body being behind crease. Credit: Sky Sport Unluckiest run out of all time? Wagner caught despite whole body being behind crease 
Peter Handscomb's hit-wicket dismissal in a recent Test against Pakistan was also hugely unfortunate. Close Handscomb hits a century, then hits his stumps UP NEXT VIDEO Handscomb hits a century, then hits his stumps. Source: 7Sport Handscomb hits a century, then hits his stumps 
This one takes the case for the most hilarious of them all. Close Comical run out to end innings UP NEXT
